verbs.description: [ARG0: Canada 's House of Commons] [ARGM-TMP: on Monday] [ARGM-MNR: unanimously] [V: condemned] [ARG1: the personal attacks on Prime Minister Justin Trudeau by U.S. President Donald Trump and his surrogates] [ARGM-TMP: as the famously polite nation simmered over the weekend broadsides by its U.S. ally] .

Canada 's House of Commons on Monday unanimously condemned the personal attacks on Prime Minister Justin Trudeau by U.S. President Donald Trump and his surrogates as [ARG1: the famously polite nation] [V: simmered] [ARG2: over the weekend broadsides by its U.S. ally] .
